typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		Date as string,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookup
source1 filter(continent == 'America' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterAmerica
FilterAmerica select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		rate_14_day,
		Date,
		each(match(name == 'Date'),
			'reported_date' = $$),
		cumulative_count,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequireFields
SelectRequireFields pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		population,
		source,
		reported_date,
		Country_Special = country + country_code),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	Count = sum(cumulative_count)
,
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: false) ~> PivotCounts
PivotCounts, CountryLookup lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
